Àtụ:MedalTableTop
Mariam Ibekwe (onye aha ọmụmụ ya bụ Nnodu ; amụrụ ụbochị iri abuo na iteghete, nke onwa Ọktoba, n'afọ 1969) bụ onye Naịjịrịa n'eme egwuregwu trak na fịud, ma sọkwa mpị na shọt puutu

Mpụtara nke onwe ya kachasị mma nke 16.68 m (54 ft 8+1⁄2 in) n'afọ 2007Ibekwe nwetara ihe nrite mbụ ya na mba ụwa n'afọ 1989, were nweta ntụrụugo na West African University Games nakwa ihe nrita ọlaọcha n'azu Hanan Ahmed Khaled n'asọmpi 1989 African Championships in Athletics, nke e mere na Legọsụ
Na 1991 All-Africa Games, Ọ nọkwa n'azụ Khaled nke mba  Ijipụtụ, ebe ọ gbara onye nke atọ na ya bu asọmpi.

Ọ gara ezumike asọmpi mba ụwa n'etiti afọ ndi sochiri afọ 1990, mana ọ laghachitere n'afọ 1997 ebe o nwetara mmeri n'asọmpi West African Athletics Championships ma gbakwaa onye nke asatọ na 1998 IAAF World Cup.Ọ gara n'ihu n'asọrịta mpi ka ọ gbachara afo iri atọ, ma sorokwa na ndi ikpeazu na 2003 All-Africa Games nakwa 2003 Afro-Asian Games

Elu ọrụ ya kacha gbagote mgbe o ruru afọ iri anọ, mgbe o tuuru ugo ma nata  ihe nrite ọla edo n'asọmpi shot puutu na 2010 African Championships in Athletics. Na ngosipụta ukwu ikpeazụ ya na mba ụwa, ọ gbara onye nke asaa na  2010 IAAF Continental CupI
N'ọkwa mba, o nwetara nturụugo atọ kwụ ọtọ n'asọmpi  Nigerian Athletics Championships n'etiti  afọ 1989 na 1991, were bụrụ nwanyị mbụ tụbara ihe karịrị mita iri na anọ n'asọmpi ahụ

Ọ dara n'azụ Vivian Chukwuemeka  n'ọkwa mba n'etiti afọ ndi sochiri afọ 1990, mana o jiri nturụugo mba abụọ laghachi n'afọ 1997 na 1998, yana ndetu mmeri nke 15.54 m (50 ft 11+¾ in) na 16.42 m (53 ft 10+¼ in)
Chukwuemeka nwetara nturụugo asaa na -esote ya, ma Ibekwe nwetara nwetara nturụugo mba nke isii ya n'afọ 2006
